tool_description: Retrieves current market pricing for specific wood species and grades from multiple suppliers in a given geographic region.

wood_species.description: Wood species name for pricing lookup

lumber_grade.description: Specific lumber grade (e.g., FAS, 1Common, Select, Construction)

region.description: Geographic region for pricing (e.g., northeast_us, pacific_northwest, midwest)

board_feet_quantity.description: Quantity in board feet for volume pricing

include_shipping.description: Whether to include shipping costs in pricing

error_messages: Species/grade combination not available: This species and grade combination is not found in the specified region
Invalid region: Region not supported for pricing data
Invalid quantity: Board feet quantity must be positive and reasonable (0.1-10000)
Invalid delivery radius: Must be between 1 and 500 miles
No suppliers found: No suppliers available within the specified delivery radius
usage: Provide wood species, grade, region, and quantity needed. Optionally adjust delivery radius and shipping inclusion for more targeted results.

average_price_per_bf.description: Average price per board foot across suppliers

price_range_low.description: Lowest price per board foot found

price_range_high.description: Highest price per board foot found

total_estimated_cost.description: Total estimated cost for the specified quantity

last_updated.description: When pricing data was last refreshed
